Sentencas: A novel design of cone-shaped tubular segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack is presented in this paper.
Titulo: A novel design and performance of cone-shaped tubular anode-supported segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The cone-shaped tubular anode substrates are fabricated by slip casting technique and the yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte films are deposited onto the anode tubes by dip coating method.
Titulo: A novel design and performance of cone-shaped tubular anode-supported segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: After sintering at 1400 degrees C for 4 h, a dense and crack-free YSZ film with a thickness of about 7 mu m is successfully obtained.
Titulo: A novel design and performance of cone-shaped tubular anode-supported segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The single cell, NiO-YSZ/YSZ (7 mu m)/LSM-YSZ, provides a maximum power density of 1.78 W cm(-2) at 800 degrees C, using moist hydrogen (75 ml min(-1)) as fuel and ambient air as oxidant.
Titulo: A novel design and performance of cone-shaped tubular anode-supported segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: A two-cell-stack based on the above-mentioned cone-shaped tubular anode-supported SOFC is fabricated.
Titulo: A novel design and performance of cone-shaped tubular anode-supported segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: Its typical operating characteristics are investigated, particularly with respect to the thermal cycling test.
Titulo: A novel design and performance of cone-shaped tubular anode-supported segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The results show that the two-cell-stack has good thermo-mechanical properties and that the developed segmented-in-series SOFC stack is highly promising for portable applications.
Titulo: A novel design and performance of cone-shaped tubular anode-supported segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cell stack
